channel.title: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (15 4.0.6-202106242108) -- Point Release!
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Install
Or.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Reinstall
Changes:
Contains all enhancements there were recently released according to the version revision of [https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-15-0-1-9-2-for-virtualbox-testers-wanted/11876](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-15-0-1-9-2-for-virtualbox-testers-wanted/11876) (`15-0-1-9-2`, not `15-0-1-9-3`).
Alternatively:
In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
* https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2526 * https://github.com/QubesOS/updates-status/issues/2527
----
(This forum post was previously a call for testers. No release critical bugs were found during the testing period. This forum post was therefore [transformed](https://forums.whonix.org/t/transform-whonix-testers-wanted-forum-news-post-into-whonix-release-forum-news-post-ok/11405) into a stable release announcement. See edit history.)

item.title: Qubes-Whonix 15 TemplateVMs (15 4.0.6-202106242108) -- Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 26 Dec 20

HowTo: Install the Stable Version of Qubes-Whonix ™ 15

How to Install Qubes-Whonix ™ 15

Or.

Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ TemplateVMs: Stable Version

How to Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ TemplateVMs - Stable Version

Changes:

Contains all enhancements there were recently released according to the version revision of https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-15-0-1-9-2-for-virtualbox-testers-wanted/11876 (15-0-1-9-2, not 15-0-1-9-3).

Alternatively:

In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

  • qubes-template-whonix-gw-15 4.0.6-202106242108 (r4.0) · Issue #2526 · QubesOS/updates-status · GitHub
  • qubes-template-whonix-ws-15 4.0.6-202106242108 (r4.0) · Issue #2527 · QubesOS/updates-status · GitHub

(This forum post was previously a call for testers. No release critical bugs were found during the testing period. This forum post was therefore transformed into a stable release announcement. See edit history.)

Read full topic
